mapper.select: SELECT goods.id AS 'id', goods.type AS 'type', goods.name AS 'name', goods.supplier AS 'supplier', goods.desc AS 'desc', goods.price AS 'price', goods.stock AS 'stock' FROM goods WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT goods.id AS 'id', goods.type AS 'type', goods.name AS 'name', goods.supplier AS 'supplier', goods.desc AS 'desc', goods.price AS 'price', goods.stock AS 'stock' FROM goods
